Package persistence

Class RepositorioFreelancer

java.lang.Object
persistence.RepositorioFreelancer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class RepositorioFreelancer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Class responsible for creating a repository to store information about freelancer.
